header: Example of bed in command position
text: First, when on the bed, one should have a view of the room and door.

header: Example of bed in command position
text: Second, the bed should not be directly in line with the door.

header: Example of bed in command position
text: Also, avoid “coffin position” where the feet of the bed are facing the door. This resembles how we carry the dead in a coffin.
